mapper.insert: insert into nft_info (contract_id, nft_id, attributes, token_series_id, name, media) VALUES (#{contractId}, #{nftId}, #{attributes}, #{tokenSeriesId}, #{name}, #{media});
mapper.select: select `id`, `contract_id` contractId, `nft_id` nftId, `attributes`, `token_series_id` tokenSeriesId, `name`, `media` from nft_info where token_series_id = #{tokenSeriesId}
